title: Share Images with Another Facility
description: A patient is being transferred to another hospital, which needs access to the imaging studies performed at the current facility.

tasks.description: Identify the imaging studies that need to be shared.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technologist selects the relevant CT and X-ray exams.

tasks.description: Use the image sharing feature to send the studies to the other hospital's PACS system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The images are electronically pushed to the receiving facility.

tasks.description: Confirm that the receiving facility has acknowledged receipt of the images.
tasks.expected_outcome: A confirmation message is received, ensuring continuity of care.
